Class Menu

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      Menu

public class Menu
extends greenfoot.World

This class helps traversing the features. For one, users can see their statistics, options, credits and also just play.

Version:
0.7
Author:
Daniel Schisch

Constructor Summary
Menu()
          Standard Constructor, which is called on many occasions like: - Starting the game for the first time - Resetting the game - Accessing and changing the code
 
Method Summary
 void addChapterImage()
          Designs the chapter Menu and equips it with the correct buttons.
 void addChapterMenuButtons()
          Addas a Back-Button to get back to the Main Menu.
 void addCreditButtons()
          Adds a Back-Button to get back to the Main Menu.
 void addLevelButtons()
          Adds a Back-Button to get back to the Chapter-Menu from the Level Selection.
 void addLevelImage(int chapter)
          Adds Level Buttons, based on the chapter, that the user can use to access a certain level.
 void addMainButtons()
          Adds Main Menu buttons for traversion.
 void addStatisticsButtons()
          Adds a Back-Button to get back to the Main Menu.
 void clearButtons()
          Removes every used button on the Screen.
 void draw()
          Draws the Menu-Screen with Buttons, based on the current mode.
 greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawChapter(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
          Draws the Chapter menu, which just lets the player choose a chapter.
 greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawCredits(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
          Draws a credits screen with information about the author and the program.
 greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawLevel(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf, int chapter)
          Draws the Level menu, based on a chosen chapter and lets the player choose a level.
 greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawMain(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
          Draws the main hub, which is the first seen screen.
 greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawStatistics(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
          Draws a statistics screen with information about the players progress.
 java.lang.String getLevel()
          Reads the currently accessed level, if the game was resetted while being in a level.
 boolean[] loadState()
          Loads the progress from a file.
 void setMode(java.lang.String s)
          Changes the current mode.

Menu

Standard Constructor, which is called on many occasions like: - Starting the game for the first time - Resetting the game - Accessing and changing the code

Method Detail

addChapterImage

public void addChapterImage()
Designs the chapter Menu and equips it with the correct buttons.

addChapterMenuButtons

public void addChapterMenuButtons()
Addas a Back-Button to get back to the Main Menu.

addCreditButtons

public void addCreditButtons()
Adds a Back-Button to get back to the Main Menu.

addLevelButtons

public void addLevelButtons()
Adds a Back-Button to get back to the Chapter-Menu from the Level Selection.

addLevelImage

public void addLevelImage(int chapter)
Adds Level Buttons, based on the chapter, that the user can use to access a certain level.

addMainButtons

public void addMainButtons()
Adds Main Menu buttons for traversion.

addStatisticsButtons

public void addStatisticsButtons()
Adds a Back-Button to get back to the Main Menu.

clearButtons

public void clearButtons()
Removes every used button on the Screen. Used in every Mode-Change.

draw

public void draw()
Draws the Menu-Screen with Buttons, based on the current mode. Main - Main-Menu Level Select - Chapter-Selection Credits - Credits Statistics - Currently Experience Chapter X - Level-Selection of a chosen Chapter

drawChapter

public greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawChapter(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
Draws the Chapter menu, which just lets the player choose a chapter.

drawCredits

public greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawCredits(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
Draws a credits screen with information about the author and the program.

drawLevel

public greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawLevel(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf,
                                          int chapter)
Draws the Level menu, based on a chosen chapter and lets the player choose a level.

drawMain

public greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawMain(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
Draws the main hub, which is the first seen screen. Everything else is accessible from here.

drawStatistics

public greenfoot.GreenfootImage drawStatistics(greenfoot.GreenfootImage gf)
Draws a statistics screen with information about the players progress.

getLevel

public java.lang.String getLevel()
Reads the currently accessed level, if the game was resetted while being in a level. The level is being written in a file.

loadState

public boolean[] loadState()
Loads the progress from a file. Has information about every finished stage.

setMode

public void setMode(java.lang.String s)
Changes the current mode.
